trans-unit.source: Provides data for a cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: 취소할 수 있는 이벤트에 대 한 데이터를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: A cancelable event is raised when a component is about to perform an action that can be canceled, such as logging on to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 취소할 수 있는 이벤트는 구성 요소를 웹 사이트에 로그온 등 취소할 수 있는 작업을 수행 하려고 할 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The LoginCancelEventArgs class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to indicate whether the event should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: LoginCancelEventArgs 클래스를 제공 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>이벤트를 취소 해야 할지 여부를 나타내는 속성을.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: A LoginCancelEventArgs object is used with controls that have cancelable actions, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 와 같은 취소할 수 있는 작업을 포함 하는 컨트롤 LoginCancelEventArgs 개체를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>컨트롤은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>컨트롤 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"></xref> class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스와 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>속성이로 설정 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"></xref> class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스와 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>속성이 지정된 된 값으로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이벤트를 취소 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 취소 해야 할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Cancel property to indicate whether an event, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoggingOut> event, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event, should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Cancel 속성을 사용 하 여 표시 여부는 이벤트와 같은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>이벤트를는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoggingOut>이벤트, 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>이벤트를 취소 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoggingOut> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event should be canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이벤트를 취소 해야 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
